spec_data.Name: fawkes-plugin-gazsim-comm
spec_data.Description:
This package contains a Fawkes plugin that allows to proxy any number
of protobuf_comm-based communication channels with configurable packet
loss.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 20 Sep 2017 05:15:21 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Fawkes plugin to simulate network communication
